item.description:
Ride on quiet back roads in the Manadnock region with 4500â€™ of total climbing. Includes 3-4 major climbs and some steep, winding descents with approx total of 2mi on well packed dirt roads. Long distances without convenience store support, must be able to carry lunch (can buy at deli at start) and emergency repair tools. Includes optional social at local tavern after ride.

More info on CRW Rides Calendar at:http://www.crw.org/rides/calendar.php
click to October 6 and click on the ride.

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Peterborough NH Hills Bike Ride
